mapper.sql: id, subject, name, given_name, family_name, middle_name, nickname, preferred_username, gender, locale, birthdate, picture, zoneinfo, password, user_type, pub_salt, enable, status, email, phone, wechat_open_id, wechat_union_id, facebook_id, google_id, twitter_id, linkedin_id, alipay_id, github_id, aws_id, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag

u.id, u.subject, u.name, u.given_name, u.family_name, u.middle_name, u.nickname, u.preferred_username, u.gender, u.locale, u.birthdate, u.picture, u.zoneinfo, u.password, u.user_type, u.pub_salt, u.enable, u.status, u.email, u.phone, u.wechat_open_id, u.wechat_union_id, u.facebook_id, u.google_id, u.twitter_id, u.linkedin_id, u.alipay_id, u.github_id, u.aws_id, u.remark, u.create_by, u.create_date, u.update_by, u.update_date, u.del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM iam_user
del_flag != 1
AND subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'),
AND given_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{given_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'),
AND family_name = #{family_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND middle_name = #{middleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND preferred_username = #{preferred_username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND locale = #{locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND birthdate = #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AND picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND zoneinfo = #{zoneinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND pub_salt = #{pubSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND wechat_open_id = #{wechatOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND wechat_union_id = #{wechatUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND facebook_id = #{facebookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND google_id = #{googleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
twitter_id = #{twitterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND linkedin_id = #{linkedinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND alipay_id = #{alipayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND github_id = #{githubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND aws_id = #{awsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SELECT
FROM iam_user u LEFT JOIN iam_role_user ru on u.id=ru.user_id LEFT JOIN iam_role_user ru2 on ru2.role_id=ru.role_id
u.del_flag != 1 AND u.user_name != 'root'
AND ru2.user_id=#{userId}
AND ru2.role_id=#{roleId}
AND u.subject LIKE CONCAT('%','${subject}','%')
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
AND u.given_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${givenName}','%')
group by u.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO iam_user ( id, subject, name, given_name, family_name, middle_name, nickname, preferred_username, gender, locale, birthdate, picture, zoneinfo, password, pub_salt, user_type, enable, status, email, phone, wechat_open_id, wechat_union_id, facebook_id, google_id, twitter_id, linkedin_id, alipay_id, github_id, aws_id, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{given_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{family_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preferred_username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{facebookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{googleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twitterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkedinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{githubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

UPDATE iam_user
subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
given_name = #{given_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
family_name = #{family_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
